name: monocot
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a plant that has one cotyledon (= a leaf part inside the seed): Sweet flag is a tall perennial wetland monocot with scented leaves. Synonym
monocotyledonCompare
dicot
More examplesFewer examplesTrees are dicots, palms are monocots.Yams are a monocot (a plant having one embryonic seed leaf).The monocots include about 60,000 species.

having one cotyledon (= a leaf part inside the seed): Rice is the seed of the monocot plants Oryza sativa or Oryza glaberrima. Synonym
monocotyledonousCompare
dicot
More examplesFewer examplesgroupings of dicotyledonous (dicot), monocotyledonous (monocot) and total weedsthe biomass of monocot weeds
